text:
Hey there!

I’m looking for some assistance with our app development. I’ve set up an app in our development account and successfully authenticated it with a test HubSpot account. I also configured contact property change event subscriptions. However, when I update the values of those properties in the test account, there’s no response.

Could anyone help me identify what might be missing or suggest some troubleshooting steps?
Who do i contact to get our SMS API gateway set up in the marketing place?
